message: Let's start fair. I take 90% and you get 10%. We can adjust later.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give away too much just yet.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 70/30 this time.  We can keep getting closer to a fair deal with each round.
I'm still not satisfied with the split. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I think I deserve a better deal.
Let's meet in the middle.  I'm willing to take a slight loss this round to try and reach a compromise. 60/40 seems like a fair starting point for us to work from.
